item.title: 121. Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock - LeetCode
item.description: Problem Description You are given an array prices where prices[i] is the price of a given stock on the i-th` day. You want to maximize your profit by choosing a single day to buy one stock and choosing a different day in the future to sell that stock. Return the maximum profit you can achieve from this transaction. If you cannot achieve any profit, return 0. Example 1: Input: prices = [7,1,5,3,6,4] Output: 5 Explanation: Buy on day 2 (price = 1) and sell on day 5 (price = 6), profit = 6-1 = 5.
